DummyVolumes._comment: Specify DummyVolumes (dummy scans) for each task/run

_description.DummyVolumes: Map of task-specific dummy volumes. Keys should match BIDS naming: 'task-<taskname>' or 'task-<taskname>_run-<runnum>'. StartTime will be calculated as: -(30s + TR Ã— DummyVolumes)
_description.PhysioPreImportTolerance: Time tolerance for finding physio files by exam datetime during pre-import step. Must be a positive number.
_description.PhysioPreImportToleranceUnits: Units for PhysioPreImportTolerance: 's' (seconds), 'min' (minutes), or 'h' (hours). Default if not specified: 'h'
_description.PhysioMatchingTolerance: Time tolerance in seconds for matching physio recordings to fMRI runs based on timestamps. GE physio starts 30s before fMRI, so 35s accounts for this offset plus small timing variations.
_description.PhysioMatchingToleranceUnits: Units for PhysioMatchingTolerance: 's' (seconds), 'min' (minutes), or 'h' (hours). Default if not specified: 's'
